This was Ireland's first T20I win against South Africa and second overall against them in internationals
Ireland has beaten South Africa for the first time in T20Is.
Ross Adair scored his first T20I century and Ireland's third century in the format
Ireland posted their highest total against South Africa in T20Is
Ross Adair hit nine sixes, the most by an Irish batter in the format
Ireland became the first team to win a match batting first at the Zayed Cricket Stadium in the last eight T20Is at the venue
Ross Adair wins the Player of the Match award for his outstanding knock of a century off 58 balls.
Ireland achieved their first T20I win against South Africa.
Ross Adair scored the third T20I century for Ireland.
Ireland's highest T20I score against South Africa with 195-6
Ireland's second-biggest T20I partnership with a 137-run stand for the first wicket
Ross Adair became the third Irish men's player to hit a T20I century
